name: df-ome
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(come, cab(s0, wa(wa(wa(wa(wf(cv(s0), cdm(cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wceq(cdm(cv(s0)), cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))))), wceq(cfv(cv(s0), emptycls), nat0)), wral(s1, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), wral(s2, cpw(cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), cle, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))), wral(s1, cpw(cdm(cv(s0))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))), cle, cfv(csumge0, cres(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
comment: Define the class of outer measures. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
